Marc Hadley wrote:

>> -a programmatic way to configure things. Right now the normal servlet
>> API is purely declarative, except for system-specific APIs. I need the
>> right to add an remove resource mappings dynamically.


I would suggest that a critical use case is being able to manage this 
from a web-based interface; e.g. like WordPress is configured.  That may 
not be part of the core or the RI, but it should be possible to design a 
  web-based management system for a be site on top of this so that it is 
possible to map file systems and restlets (or whatever) to URL 
structures without having to drop down to code or config files.
